com.johnpetitto.validator

Class Validators

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.johnpetitto.validator.Validators

  • public final class Validators
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of utilities for working with ValidatingTextInputLayout.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Validator EMAIL
      Validates input for email formatting.
      static Validator PHONE
      Validates input for phone number formatting.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Validator minimum(int length)
      Validates input for meeting a minimum number of characters.
      static Validator minimum(int length, boolean trim)
      Validates input for meeting a minimum number of characters.
      static boolean validate(ValidatingTextInputLayout... layouts)
      Validates multiple inputs at once and returns true if all inputs are valid.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(ValidatingTextInputLayout... layouts)
        Validates multiple inputs at once and returns true if all inputs are valid.

      • minimum

        public static Validator minimum(int length)
        Validates input for meeting a minimum number of characters. For validating against trimmed input, minimum(int, boolean).

      • minimum

        public static Validator minimum(int length,
                                boolean trim)
        Validates input for meeting a minimum number of characters. Pass true for trim to validate against trimmed input.
